SELECT COUNT(DATA_NO) FROM ( SELECT D.DATA_NO, D.WRITER_NO AS WRITER_NO, D.CATEGORY_NO AS CATEGORY_NO, D.SECURITY_LEVEL AS SECURITY_LEVEL, D.TITLE AS TITLE, D.CONTENT AS CONTENT, D.ENROLL_DATE AS ENROLL_DATE, D.HIT AS HIT, D.DELETE_YN AS DELETE_YN, U.NAME AS WRITERNAME, U.TEAM_NO AS TEAM_NO, T.TEAM_NAME AS WRITERTEAM, DF.FILE_NAME AS FIRSTFILE, DC.NAME AS CATEGORYNAME, P.NAME AS securityLevelName, COUNT(*) AS FILECNT FROM DATAROOM D JOIN MEMBER U ON D.WRITER_NO = U.NO JOIN TEAM T ON U.TEAM_NO = T.TEAM_NO JOIN DATAROOM_FILE DF ON D.DATA_NO = DF.DATA_NO JOIN DATAROOM_CATEGORY DC ON D.CATEGORY_NO = DC.NO JOIN POSITION P ON D.SECURITY_LEVEL = P.P_LEVEL WHERE D.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}
AND TITLE LIKE ('%'|| #{searchValue}|| '%')
AND U.NAME LIKE ('%'|| #{searchValue}|| '%')
AND P.NAME LIKE ('%'|| #{searchValue}|| '%')
GROUP BY D.DATA_NO, D.WRITER_NO, D.CATEGORY_NO, D.SECURITY_LEVEL, D.TITLE, D.CONTENT, D.ENROLL_DATE, D.HIT, D.DELETE_YN, U.NAME, U.TEAM_NO, T.TEAM_NAME, DF.FILE_NAME, DC.NAME, P.NAME )
